comment: Same here, numbers very small. When You're Right You're Right & You'll Always Win The Fight If you insult their intelligence with facts, they eventually start to catch on, their not so quick to act up about something without FIRST learning more about it. To wake up a LIBTARD I start with simple VISUAL analogies & move on to VERBAL once you get their attention.
